verbs.description: Supreme Court [V: will] weigh claims that President Trump 's limited travel ban oversteps his power because its singles out several mostly Muslim nations . The argument before the high court is a major test of presidential authority over immigration as well as claims of bias against Trump .

The argument before the high court is a major test of presidential authority over immigration as well as claims of bias against Trump .
